nodes.text: Fork-nosed ice worms were a rare species of worm that could be found on Hoth, a frozen Outer Rim planet. Weeks after the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, Doctor Chelli Aphra visited the world and recovered a fossilized fork-nosed ice worm. Aphra brought the fossil to the Shadow University, where she sold it to Sava Estat.
Fork-nosed ice worms first appeared in the comic book Doctor Aphra 1, which was written by Alyssa Wong, illustrated by Marika Cresta, and published on May 4, 2020 by Marvel Comics.
